item.title: I’m a VPN expert — these are the 3 things I want the industry to adopt in 2026
item.description: The new year brings fresh opportunities for improvements to an industry under increasing scrutiny

item.title: What a meltdown in the wine aisle taught me about New Year’s resolutions
item.description: Six months of obsessing over wine decisions led me to a bigger truth: most of our New Year rituals are built for who we wish we were, not who we actually are. The fix is simpler than you think. I just launched a wine app, which means I’ve spent the last six months thinking obsessively about one thing: how do you remove friction from decisions that shouldn’t be hard?...

item.title: Moon phase today: What the moon will look like on January 1
item.description: See the moon phase expected for January 1, 2025 as well as when the next full moon is expected.
